comment.text: Membrane-cytoskeleton-associated protein that promotes the assembly of the spectrin-actin network. Binds to calmodulin.
Heterodimer of an alpha and a beta subunit or an alpha and a gamma subunit.
Expressed in all tissues. Found in much higher levels in reticulocytes than the beta subunit.
Each subunit is comprised of three regions: a NH2-terminal protease-resistant globular head region, a short connecting subdomain, and a protease-sensitive tail region.
Belongs to the aldolase class II family. Adducin subfamily.

property.value: Expressed in primary visual cortex and 248 other tissues
P:homeostasis of number of cells within a tissue
P:positive regulation of adherens junction organization
P:positive regulation of establishment of endothelial barrier

feature.description: Abolishes phosphorylation by ROCK2; when associated with D-480.
Abolishes phosphorylation by ROCK2; when associated with D-445.
